   Pretty print a `node` of type `XmlExpr <https://github.com/pganalyze/libpg_query/blob/db39825/src/postgres/include/nodes/primnodes.h#L1222>`__ to the `output` stream.

.. index:: XmlSerialize

.. function:: xml_serialize(node, output)

   Pretty print a `node` of type `XmlSerialize <https://github.com/pganalyze/libpg_query/blob/db39825/src/postgres/include/nodes/parsenodes.h#L793>`__ to the `output` stream.
